item.title: Titlebar - Large Subtitle - Simple
item.content:encoded: [vc_row columns_animation="scale-up" columns_animation_duration="1000" columns_animation_delay="500"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-10"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="`{`omnis_title`}`" heading_container="h1" heading_typography="size-class:h3-size"][vc_custom_heading heading_text="`{`omnis_subtitle`}`" heading_container="h2" heading_typography="size-class:h1-mid"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

There is plenty to see." heading_container="p" heading_typography="size-class:font-size-small"][/vc_column][vc_column column_alignment_h="right" width="1/3" offset="vc_col-xs-12"][loprd_navigation nav_menu="128" nav_menu_layout="horizontal" nav_menu_typo="text-transform:none|font-weight:400"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
